comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #650279 +++

It would be nice to be able to measure how long each CRL and/or OCSP fetch takes, so that web development tools can report them.
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
